spiritsExplanation: The workout primarily embodies the 'Soothing & Restorative' spirit, scored at 0.6, due to its focus on low-impact exercises suitable for those with knee or lower body issues, as highlighted in the title and description ('No Jumping,' 'workout for knee problem'). Finally, the 'Structured & Disciplined' spirit is relevant with a score of 0.6, as the video suggests performing the routine regularly and outlines a clear sequence of exercises in the comments ('30 knee raises', '30 lateral arm circles').
